quotes.message: We are not a victim of our emotions or thoughts. We can understand our triggers and use them as tools to help us respond more objectively.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Thornton

quotes.message: There are no victims, only volunteers.
quotes.name: Robert Anthony

quotes.message: We're all victims of our own hubris at times.
quotes.name: Kevin Spacey

quotes.message: Victims make excuses. Leaders deliver results.
quotes.name: Robin Sharma

quotes.message: The victim of mind-manipulation does not know that he is a victim.
quotes.name: Aldous Huxley

quotes.message: You are a victim only when you have decided to play the part.
quotes.name: Gary Hopkins

quotes.message: Where victims see adversity, extreme achievers see opportunity.
quotes.name: Robin Sharma

quotes.message: The worst kind of victim was the kind that was aware of nothing.
quotes.name: B. Barmanbek

quotes.message: The victim to too severe a law is considered as a martyr rather than a criminal.
quotes.name: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.message: We're all victims of what life deals out. It's how we handle it that's important.
quotes.name: Nora Roberts

quotes.message: We were not the victims of ancestor worship. We had the benefits of a fresh start.
quotes.name: Matthew D. Miller

quotes.message: You can't play the role of a victim all your life without becoming one in the end.
quotes.name: Danilo Kis

quotes.message: We become victims of the great disease of technological society - meaninglessness.
quotes.name: Doris Janzen Longacre

quotes.message: We are not victims of the world we see, we are victims of the way we see the world.
quotes.name: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.message: You are not a helpless victim of your own thoughts, but rather a master of your own mind.
quotes.name: Louise Hay

quotes.message: What hurts the victim most is not the cruelty of the oppressor, but the silence of the bystander.
quotes.name: Elie Wiesel

quotes.message: The real victim of bigotry is the white man who hides his weakness under his myth of superiority.
quotes.name: James A. Baldwin

quotes.message: You become the victim of the past, and your tormentor today is your self left over from yesterday.
quotes.name: Deepak Chopra

quotes.message: We are all victims of the violence that animals suffer... their liberation is also our liberation.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: You are not a victim of your circumstance.Stay determine to endure hard times. No situation is permanent.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Victims of oppression & injustice don't need our spasm of passion....they need our legs & lungs of endurance.
quotes.name: Gary Haugen

quotes.message: One victim lives in tragedy, another victim stops to stare, and still another walks on by pretending not to see
quotes.name: Bob Seger

quotes.message: Don't become a victim of yourself.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Once trapped in the belief that you are a victim, you surrender your birthright to compete for the prizes of life.
quotes.name: James Cook

quotes.message: The victims of crime have been transformed into a group oppressively burdened by a system designed to protect them.
quotes.name: Ronald Reagan

quotes.message: It is true that a victim who fights back may suffer for it, but one who does not almost certainly will suffer for it.
quotes.name: Jeff Cooper

quotes.message: As victims of hurt, we frequently don't bring up what ails us, because so many wounds look absurd in the light of day.
quotes.name: Alain De Botton

quotes.message: We are all both victims and victimizers. Just as everyone suffers, no one is innocent of causing suffering themselves.
quotes.name: Tullian Tchividjian

quotes.message: We don't have to be victims of our past, that we can let go of our bitterness, and that all of us can achieve greatness.
quotes.name: Nelson Mandela

quotes.message: The victim who is able to articulate the situation of the victim has ceased to be a victim: he or she has become a threat.
quotes.name: James A. Baldwin

quotes.message: We are the victims of the world's most comprehensive robbery. Life demands a balance. It's all right if we do a little robbing now.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Definition of a victim: a person to whom life happens.
quotes.name: Peter McWilliams

quotes.message: We are all victims of culture.
quotes.name: Jacque Fresco

quotes.message: Becoming a victim is your choice.
quotes.name: Rajashree Choudhury

quotes.message: You are a victim of the rules you live by.
quotes.name: Jenny Holzer

quotes.message: We are only victims if we allow ourselves to be.
quotes.name: McCartney Green

quotes.message: A victim of your own greed..wallowing in the muck of avarice.
quotes.name: Jake Roberts

quotes.message: If you act like a victim, you are likely to be treated as one.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: How could I pretend to be a victim when I was so willing to sin?
quotes.name: Emily M. Danforth

quotes.message: Do not be victim of life-negative religions. Be respectful to life, love and beauty.
quotes.name: Amit Ray

quotes.message: No woman has to be a victim of physical abuse. Women have to feel like they are not alone.
quotes.name: Salma Hayek

quotes.message: All victims have experienced a loss-a thwarted desire or aspiration-even if they're not aware of it.
quotes.name: David Emerald Womeldorff

quotes.message: Being a victim is almost as easy as being a liberal. It's one of the most gutless choices you could make.
quotes.name: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.message: Victims suggest innocence. And innocence, by the inexorable logic that governs all relational terms, suggests guilt.
quotes.name: Susan Sontag

quotes.message: If you're a victim, you're not happy. You can't be happy. It's impossible to be happy. It's even difficult to be content.
quotes.name: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.message: No victim wants their record, or their minor story to be told. Every victim should have the right to tell their own story.
quotes.name: Jim Bob Duggar
